Add enhanced table functionality with sortable columns and edit modals

- Implemented EnhancedTable component with sorting, filtering, column customization
- Added EditModal component for inline editing
- Enhanced all major tables: Products, Customers, Vendors, Client POs, Vendor POs, Shipments, Inventory, Production
- Clickable primary keys open edit modals
- Added search, filter, and CSV export capabilities
- Updated cache version to v6.0

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical production bugs - blank screen issue

- Removed orphaned clientPreview code fragment causing ReferenceError
- Fixed EnhancedTable filterOptions to use values array instead of options
- Added null safety for filter.values array
- Updated cache version to v6.1

Fixes:
- Uncaught ReferenceError: clientPreview is not defined
- TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading ''map'')

)")
